name: The DAM Hard Quiz Show
description:
The DAM Hard Quiz Show is thrilled to welcome its newest contestant... you!

Your goal is simple; Just answer 8 questions correctly and you'll be rewarded with fame, fortune, and the even-more-coveted respect of our host; the handsome, delicious and all-round fantastic Chris Torrent (steady, ladies)!

Let's dive in and play The DAM Hard Quiz Show- the only game show on Earth to be situated at the bottom of an abandoned dam (did we forget to mention that?)...

What could possibly go wrong? Controls

LEFT:   Move Left
RIGHT:   Move Right
UP:   Jump
DOWN:   Slide
ENTER:   Next/OK
NUM KEYS (1-4):   Select Answer
